tome.name: Purging Lemure Transformation
tome.description: On cast, remove any conditions of your choice from yourself.

tome.name: Efficient Lemure Transformation
tome.description: Can be cast as a 1st-level spell.

tome.name: Soulbound Intellect Fortress
tome.description: If cast on another creature, both you and the creature add 1d4 psychic damage to your spells for the duration.

tome.name: Rapid Mislead
tome.description: You can control your copy as a bonus action, and can do so twice per turn. Switching between your copy's and your own senses is a free action.

tome.name: Blinking Mislead
tome.description: As part of the casting, you may teleport up to 30' in any direction after turning invisible.

tome.name: Efficient Modify Memory
tome.description: Can be cast as a 4th-level spell.

tome.name: Blinding Darkness
tome.description: Creatures leaving area must make CON save or be blinded for 1 minute, or until passing a passive save.

tome.name: Enfeebling Darkness
tome.description: On cast, creatures of your choice in the area are debilitated until the end of your next turn.

manual.name: Grievous Overrun
manual.description: On hit, target makes a CON save or 1 S DoT.

manual.name: Culling Mistaken Opportunity
manual.description: Attack deals +1d10 base damage against bloodied targets.

manual.name: Debilitating Mistaken Opportunity
manual.description: The debilitation lasts until the target passes a passive CON save.
